articles.author: Maayan Lubell, Nidal Al-Mughrabi
articles.description: What will come next remains unclear in the absence of a comprehensive agreement on the postwar future of Gaza, and although the stated aim of the ceasefire is to end the war entirely, it could easily unravel.
articles.title: Gaza ceasefire and hostage release set to begin

articles.author: James Oliphant, Steve Holland
articles.description: The goal is to inject political loyalists deep into the workings of government, perhaps more so than any other recent president.
articles.title: How Trump aims to dismantle the ‘deep state’ and assert control

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: The platform has until Sunday to cut ties with its China-based parent, ByteDance, or shut down its U.S. operation to resolve concerns it posed a threat to national security.
articles.title: TikTok faces US ban deadline as users brace for fallout

articles.author: Joyce Lee, Hyunsu Yim
articles.description: A South Korean court granted on Sunday an extension of President Yoon Suk Yeol's detention, saying there was "concern" that Yoon could "destroy evidence" in a criminal probe related to his short-lived declaration of martial law in early December.
articles.title: South Korean court extends President Yoon's detention

articles.author: Sabine Siebold, Friederike Heine
articles.description: Germany's ambassador to the United States has warned that the incoming Trump administration will rob U.S. law enforcement and the media of their independence and hand big tech companies "co-governing power", according to a confidential document seen by Reuters.
articles.title: Exclusive: German ambassador warns of Trump plan to redefine constitutional order, document shows

articles.author: Steve Holland
articles.description: President-elect Donald Trump is set to arrive in Washington on Saturday evening for an inauguration celebration marking his return to power that has been upended by record cold temperatures.
articles.title: Trump's return to Washington before inauguration features fireworks, Elvis impersonator

articles.author: Gabriella Borter
articles.description: Demonstrators rallied for abortion and immigration rights as well as local D.C. issues.
articles.title: Thousands gather in Washington to protest Trump inauguration

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: The Philippines and the United States carried out joint maritime exercises for a fifth time in the South China Sea, Manila's armed forces said on Sunday, in a move that would likely irk China.
articles.title: Philippines, U.S. hold joint maritime exercises in South China Sea

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: The Colombian government's human rights ombudsman said on Saturday the death toll from violence in the Catatumbo region had risen to 60, up from a previous tally of 30 from attacks by the leftist National Liberation Army (ELN).
articles.title: Death toll in Colombia's Catatumbo rises to 60, ombudsman says

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Four people were killed early on Saturday in the centre of Kyiv in a night-time Russian attack, said Timur Tkachenko, head of the Ukrainian capital's military administration.
articles.title: Four dead in night-time Russian attack on Kyiv, military administration says
